script.caption: Mike is placing a large 'Congrats Grad!' banner across the entrance of the house.

dialogue.text: Every decoration should scream 'best party ever'! Trust me, no one will forget this.
Ha, from all the parties in high school to this. Let's make it unforgettable, alright?

script.caption: Liam is setting up the buffet table, filled with an assortment of snacks and drinks.

dialogue.text: Half of these snacks might not make it to the party.
Control yourself, buddy. We ain't losing any chip before the party starts!

script.caption: Liam and Mike are adjusting the speakers in the main party area.

dialogue.text: The key to a great party is quality sound, Liam. Bass drop has to shake the foundations!
Oh, and dealing with our neighbours tomorrow? Should I prepare my apology speech now?

script.caption: Mike and Liam stand back admiring their handiwork, a perfectly decorated party venue.

dialogue.text: This is it, Mike. We've outdone ourselves.
It's a wrap, off to commemorate the start of our real lives. Let's make this a night to remember, Liam.
